snippet: Philadelphia, which ended a four-game skid by winning on the road against the Nets, will be looking for its all-hands-on-deck philosophy to lead the way to the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia, which ended a four-game skid by winning on the road against the Nets, will be looking for its all-hands-on-deck philosophy to lead the way to the playoffs.

headline.seo: 76ers Hope to Rebound for N.B.A. Stretch Run
headline.main: 76ers Hope to Rebound for N.B.A. Stretch Run
headline.print_headline: 76ers Hope to Rebound for N.B.A. Stretch Run
